thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com
thread.title: JoAnn King

author: JoAnn King
title: JoAnn King
text:
First off I loved my last order! (High waist leggings with zippers up the sides) the leggings fit like a glove! The shirt was amazing as well!
Only down side, not a whole lot of items left in 3x.. now i know not a lot of big girls such as myself work out, but when we do we want to look as good as everyone else!
I had a member credit that i was looking forward to using until i got on the site. It took 6 outfits before I could find one that worked size wise.
Also, i wish you could mix and match. Not be confined to the outfit that you put together.
Well thanks for listening and hope to see more plus size stuff cuz i don't want to stop shopping with you!
